short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Basic protection against HTML smuggling attempts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SmuggleSheild is an experimental browser extension that aims to prevent basic HTML smuggling attacks by detecting common patterns. While this is not a comprehensive or bulletproof solution, it is an attempt to provide an additional layer of security during browsing.
